name: Pigs For Machine A
description:
Oooooohhhh...

If you like games and think them jolly
Then we have one for you, oh golly
To pass it up, t'would be a folly
So jump in that ol' Class A Trolley

There's lots of pigs so make a dash
And rip their guts out in a flash
Don't be afraid to make a splash
And you'll be rewarded in cash

Press W, point the mouse to go,
Or A and bumper on a gamepad, Joe,
Just press some buttons, make blood flow,
There's pigs to kill for coin, you know!

THIS MESSAGE WAS BROUGHT TO YOU BY MR SMITH-WORTH'S SASSAGES
PURVEYOR OF FINE-QUALITY SASSAGES

OK so:
Run over pigs with Machine A and earn $3

Controls:
W key + Mouse / A button + Left Thumb stick on Xbox Controller: Move
Escape key: Exit
S key: Take Screenshot
-/=: Increase/decrease volume (press repeatedly)

WARNING:

The screen shakes a lot in this, so be careful if you and wildly flashing images don't get along.

Credits:

Music from Kevin MacLeod: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/

Sounds from https://www.freesound.org/
